scripts.test: pnpm run test:rsc && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: sh -c 'npx kill-port 4000 4001 4101 4102 2>/dev/null || true; playwright test e2e/*.e2e.test.js --workers=1; code=$?; npx kill-port 4000 4001 4101 4102 2>/dev/null || true; exit $code'
scripts.test:e2e:rsc: sh -c 'npx kill-port 4000 4001 4101 4102 2>/dev/null || true; playwright test e2e/rsc.notes.e2e.test.js e2e/rsc.app2.notes.e2e.test.js --workers=1; code=$?; npx kill-port 4000 4001 4101 4102 2>/dev/null || true; exit $code'
